definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: The complexity of the project was way beyond out expection.
sentences.chinese: 這個計劃的複雜性出乎我們的意料之外。

sentences.english: A further collapse in prices could be forestalled by unexpected supply disruptions.
sentences.chinese: 意料之外的供應中斷可能會阻止價格的進一步暴跌。

sentences.english: As expect, the gentleman grow weary of his new ladylove before long.
sentences.chinese: 不出意料之外，這位紳士不久就厭倦了他的新情婦。

sentences.english: We had more time to talk -- an unexpected pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 我們有更多時間交談，這是意料之外的收穫。

sentences.english: I was surprised by the speediness of their arrival.
sentences.chinese: 他們的迅速到來出乎我的意料之外。

sentences.english: An excuse unexpected arouses suspicion from its slumbers.
sentences.chinese: 一次意料之外的申辯，會喚醒原本沉睡的懷疑。

sentences.english: So you could say I was an accidental spy.
sentences.chinese: 所以你也可以說我是一名意料之外的特工。

sentences.english: To his surprise Brissenden shook his head.
sentences.chinese: 出乎他意料之外，布里森登搖了搖頭。

sentences.english: Tell me something people aren't expecting that you think is going to happen.
sentences.chinese: 你認爲接下來會發生哪些出乎人們意料之外的事情。

sentences.english: Captain Charles Moore had an unexpected discovery in 1997.
sentences.chinese: 船長查理斯摩爾在1997年有一個意料之外的發現。

definition: due to/to stem from/to go beyond (also fig. beyond reason, expectations etc)/to go against (expectations)
to come as no surprise/as expected
turned out other than expected (idiom); unexpected
not expected at the outset (idiom)/unforeseen/to be surprised by the turn of events
unexpected/hard to imagine/it had not occurred to me/who could have thought that
to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
